SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.commn.dao

Interface MeasurementDao

All Superinterfaces:
AbstractDao<Measurement>
All Known Implementing Classes:
MeasurementDaoImpl
public interface MeasurementDao extends AbstractDao<Measurement>
Data Access Object interface for Measurement entities providing comprehensive database operations for clinical measurement data in OpenO EMR.

This DAO provides extensive query capabilities for retrieving measurements by various criteria including patient demographics, measurement types, date ranges, appointments, and providers. It serves as the primary data access layer for the measurement system.

Key functionality groups:

  • Patient-based queries: Find measurements by demographic ID, type, and date ranges
  • Appointment-based queries: Retrieve measurements associated with specific appointments
  • Provider-based queries: Find measurements by provider and update tracking
  • Laboratory integration: Support for LOINC codes and lab-specific identifiers
  • Temporal queries: Date-based filtering and chronological ordering
  • Type-specific queries: Operations focused on specific measurement types

Common usage patterns:


 // Get all measurements for a patient
 List<Measurement> measurements = measurementDao.findByDemographicNo(demographicId);
 
 // Get specific measurement type for patient
 List<Measurement> bloodPressure = measurementDao.findByDemographicNoAndType(demographicId, "BP");
 
 // Get latest measurement of specific type
 Measurement latest = measurementDao.findLatestByDemographicNoAndType(demographicId, "WT");
 
 // Get measurements within date range
 List<Measurement> recent = measurementDao.findByDemographicIdObservedDate(demographicId, startDate, endDate);
Since:
2006

  • Method Details

    • findByDemographicIdUpdatedAfterDate

      List<Measurement> findByDemographicIdUpdatedAfterDate(Integer demographicId, Date updatedAfterThisDate)
      Finds measurements for a specific patient that were updated after a given date. Useful for synchronization and incremental data retrieval.
      Parameters:
      demographicId - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      updatedAfterThisDate - Date the cutoff date for updates
      Returns:
      List measurements updated after the specified date

    • findByCreateDate

      List<Measurement> findByCreateDate(Date updatedAfterThisDateExclusive, int itemsToReturn)
      Finds measurements created after a specific date, with a limit on results. Date parameter is exclusive (measurements created exactly on this date are not included).
      Parameters:
      updatedAfterThisDateExclusive - Date the exclusive cutoff date
      itemsToReturn - int maximum number of measurements to return
      Returns:
      List up to the specified number of measurements

    • findDemographicIdsUpdatedAfterDate

      List<Integer> findDemographicIdsUpdatedAfterDate(Date updatedAfterThisDate)
      Finds demographic IDs of patients who have measurements updated after a given date. Useful for determining which patients have measurement changes.
      Parameters:
      updatedAfterThisDate - Date the cutoff date for updates
      Returns:
      List demographic IDs with measurement updates

    • findMatching

      List<Measurement> findMatching(Measurement measurement)
      Finds measurements that match the properties of the given measurement template. Uses non-null properties of the template for matching criteria.
      Parameters:
      measurement - Measurement template with criteria to match
      Returns:
      List measurements matching the template properties

    • findByDemographicNo

      List<Measurement> findByDemographicNo(Integer demographicNo)
      Finds all measurements for a specific patient. One of the most commonly used methods for retrieving patient measurement history.
      Parameters:
      demographicNo - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      Returns:
      List all measurements for the patient, typically ordered by date

    • findByDemographicNoAndType

      List<Measurement> findByDemographicNoAndType(Integer demographicNo, String type)
      Finds all measurements of a specific type for a specific patient. Commonly used for retrieving measurement trends (e.g., blood pressure over time).
      Parameters:
      demographicNo - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      type - String the measurement type code (e.g., "BP", "WT", "HT")
      Returns:
      List all measurements of the specified type for the patient

    • findLatestByDemographicNoAndType

      Measurement findLatestByDemographicNoAndType(int demographicNo, String type)
      Finds the most recent measurement of a specific type for a patient. Essential for displaying current values in patient charts and clinical decision support.
      Parameters:
      demographicNo - int the patient's demographic ID
      type - String the measurement type code
      Returns:
      Measurement the most recent measurement of the specified type, or null if none found

    • findByAppointmentNo

      Finds all measurements recorded during a specific appointment. Used for encounter-based measurement retrieval and reporting.
      Parameters:
      appointmentNo - Integer the appointment ID
      Returns:
      List measurements recorded during the appointment

    • findByDemographicIdObservedDate

      List<Measurement> findByDemographicIdObservedDate(Integer demographicId, Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Finds measurements for a patient within a specific observation date range. Uses the dateObserved field (clinical date) rather than system entry date.
      Parameters:
      demographicId - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      startDate - Date the start of the observation date range (inclusive)
      endDate - Date the end of the observation date range (inclusive)
      Returns:
      List measurements observed within the date range

      types - String[] array of measurement type codes to retrieve
      Returns:

      Measurement findLastEntered(Integer demo, String type)

      type - String the measurement type code

    • findByType

      List<Measurement> findByType(Integer demographicId, String type)
      Finds all measurements of a specific type for a patient. Alias method providing alternative signature for demographic-type queries.
      Parameters:
      demographicId - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      type - String the measurement type code
      Returns:
      List all measurements of the specified type

    • findByType

      List<Measurement> findByType(Integer demographicId, String type, Date after)
      Finds measurements of a specific type for a patient after a given date. Combines patient, type, and temporal filtering.
      Parameters:
      demographicId - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      type - String the measurement type code
      after - Date the cutoff date (measurements after this date)
      Returns:
      List measurements of the specified type after the date

    • findByType

      List<Measurement> findByType(Integer demographicId, List<String> types)
      Finds measurements of multiple types for a patient. Efficient way to retrieve several measurement types in a single query.
      Parameters:
      demographicId - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      types - List list of measurement type codes to retrieve
      Returns:
      List measurements matching any of the specified types

    • findMeasurementByTypeAndDate

      List<Measurement> findMeasurementByTypeAndDate(Integer demoNo, String type, Date start, Date end)
      Finds measurements of a specific type within a date range for a patient. Combines patient, type, and date range filtering for focused queries.
      Parameters:
      demoNo - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      type - String the measurement type code
      start - Date the start of the date range
      end - Date the end of the date range
      Returns:
      List measurements matching all criteria
